definition.name: UV_regularization
definition.definition: The UV (ultraviolet) regularization replaces the distributional field phi by the smoothed field phi_eps = rho_eps * phi, where rho_eps is a mollifier at scale eps > 0. The regularized Phi^4_3 measure mu_eps = Z_eps^{-1} exp(-V_eps(phi)) dmu_0(phi) is absolutely continuous w.r.t. the GFF mu_0 for each eps > 0.
